features: Durable performance: The soft fabric is really resistant and can be worn throughout the year. Year after year
Comfort fit: The soft high-stretch fabric and wide waistband make this tight ultra-comfortable
Outdoor versatile: Effortlessly adapts to different outdoor activities from hiking to climbing with deep side pockets
Tight Fit: For bottoms, tights, knits. A close to the skin fit
2 side pockets: Classic side-pocket construction to store your contents
